Event.name: Growing_food
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Grower</fen> endeavors to tend to and influence the environment of <fen>Food</fen> so as to foster its growth.
<ex><fex name="Grower">I</fex> <t>grow</t> <fex name="Food">my own vegetables</fex>.</ex>
</def-root>

Arg.name: Food
Arg.definition:
<def-root><fex name="Food">Food</fex> is the item grown by the <fen>Grower</fen>, which can include things not traditionally eaten, like flowers, etc., or items for other consumption-related uses, like medicines, smokables, etc.
<ex><fex name="Grower">He</fex> <t>grew</t> <fex name="Food">flowers and potatoes</fex>.</ex>
</def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Instrument</fen> is used by the <fen>Grower</fen> as a tool grow <fen>Food</fen>. (This tool is not limited to typical artifacts and can be hands, arms, and other atypical hunting and fishing instruments.)
<ex>Heavy-yielding crops are <t>grown</t> <fex name="Instrument">with chemical fertilizers</fex></ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition:
<def-root>For what length of time the <fen>Grower</fen> is growing <fen>Food</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which the <fen>Grower</fen> grows <fen>Food</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The greater geographic location where the <fen>Grower</fen> grows <fen>Food</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An action that the <fen>Grower</fen> intends to accomplish by growing <fen>Food</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Grower">He</fex> can <t>grow</t> <fex name="Food">flowers</fex> <fex name="Purpose">to beautify the garden</fex></ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Particular_iteration
Arg.definition: <def-root>Expressions marked with this extra-thematic FE modify a non-iterative use of the target, and indicate that it is conceived as embedded within an iterated series of similar events or states.</def-root>

Arg.name: Ground
Arg.definition: <def-root>This is the the physical background or context for the <fen>Food</fen> to which the <fen>Grower</fen> pays attention in his growing efforts.</def-root>

Arg.name: Circumstances
Arg.definition: <def-root>Circumstances describe the state of the world (at a particular time and place) which is specifically independent of the event itself and any of its participants. </def-root>

Arg.name: Source
Arg.definition: <def-root>The starting state of the <fen>Food</fen>, e.g., a seed.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: grow.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to raise or develop crops or livestock
